name: CHPB WDIO
description: End to end + negative login test of https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/

scripts.ui:chrome: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --suite ui
scripts.ui:edge: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=edge npm run wdio -- --suite ui
scripts.negative:chrome: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --suite negative --logLevel warn
scripts.negative:edge: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=edge npm run wdio -- --suite negative
scripts.requests:chrome: npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --suite requests
scripts.smoke:chrome: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --suite smoke
scripts.smoke:edge: npm run clean && npx cross-env ENV=edge npm run wdio -- --suite smoke
scripts.run:github: npm run clean && npm run wdio-headless -- --suite smoke && npm run wdio-headless -- --suite ui && npm run wdio-headless -- --suite requests
scripts.clean: rimraf allure-report && rimraf allure-results && rimraf screenshots/failed-tests/*

author: Valiantsin Lutchanka
